name: Return
description: You lash out at a creature, in hopes it will please your trainer. Make a melee attack roll against a creature, doing 1d6 + MOVE on a hit. When you make this attack, add an additional bonus to hit and damage equal to the number of levels you are above zero on the Loyalty Chart.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
